doc.headline: OMG! Peyngyang is to host olympic 2018 games! whatever our world is coming to???
doc.post:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/othe...ts/8753631.stm
****, I'm wondering how much Kim ir Sen, Kim il Jong and his fat slanty-eyed kids paid to the Olympic committee to get this???
Anyone going there will probably be shot and their bodies boiled with dogs, or whatever else these commie bastards devour there.
Anyone tell me how the hell did this happen? When I read this I sat like an idiot trying to realise if this was a joke or not.
Krazy....

Kim Jong il is from North Korea
idiot...
true that

http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/othe...ts/8753631.stm
****, I'm wondering how much Kim ir Sen, Kim il Jong and his fat slanty-eyed kids paid to the Olympic committee to get this???
Anyone going there will probably be shot and their bodies boiled with dogs, or whatever else these commie bastards devour there.
Anyone tell me how the hell did this happen? When I read this I sat like an idiot trying to realise if this was a joke or not.
Krazy....
Urm, they are talking about South Korea? Not North Korea?
Pyeongchang is a city in South Korea and is hosting the games, your thinking of Pyongyang in North Korea.

I'm assuming you're trolling. Should that be hoping?
Pyeongchang is in SOUTH KOREA.
Kim Jong Il is the leader of NORTH KOREA.
Are you following?
THEY'RE TWO SEPARATE COUNTRIES.
This is what happens when imbeciles are allowed an opinion.
lol
North Korea and South Korea are two very separate and very different countries.
Threads like this don't really support the argument of allowing freedom of speech.
WTF? Is the country even cold enough for snow let alone a Winter Olympics?

1) It's Pyeongchang. Surely if you linked the article, this means you read it, and could spell the place name right.
2) You seem to have misunderstood and are talking about completely the wrong country.

1) Spell it right bitch, it's Pyeongchang not Peyngyang
2) This is South Korea, not North Korea
3) Don't use their facial features or diet as a reason why they should not host the Winter Olympics you silly boy. I mean have you seen their women?

...
that is all.

I'm assuming you're trolling. Should that be hoping?
Pyeongchang is in SOUTH KOREA.
